column2: "To be honest, I didn't think you'd succeed."
"My calculations included the possibility of sacrificing either you or Matoi."
"Then I ran simulations on how I'd support the rest of ARKS after those scenarios..."
"...but now that's all up in smoke. My simulations, models... time to start over from scratch."
"Don't get me wrong, that's a good thing! I didn't want those scenarios to come true!"
"I'm so glad that my calculations were wrong, and my predictions aren't absolute."
"I'm sure Xion was thinking the same, too."
"Unfortunately, these events now leave us with a very large problem..."
"...Welcome back, Matoi."
"...Good to be back!"
"That new outfit really suits you well."
"Gee, thanks!"
"So, Xiao. About what happens next..."
"Yes, I know. [Profound Darkness] will return..."
"You two saw it, yes? [Persona's] form when it transformed into [Profound Darkness]..."
"It retreated at that moment, but there is no doubt we will face it in the near future."
"We must be prepared to meet it with full force. The Council of Six is spearheading the preparation effort for ARKS."
"<%me>, Matoi."
"Your strength will be the key to the battle ahead."
"We're heavily counting on the both of you, so please, be prepared."
"Yes sir!"
"Is This Reason"
"7章 あなたがうまれたそのりゆう"
